title: Art History - Art Since 1945
description: History of visual art from 1945 to the present. Focus on significant movements such as Abstract, Expressionism, Pop art, minimalism, conceptual art, earthworks, feminism, and postmodernism. Also focus on new media such as performance, video, and installation. 4 lectures.
prerequisites: ART 111 or ART 112 or ART 211 or ART 212, or consent of instructor
